name: Insanely Easy Vegetarian Chili
author: Tia the Baker
summary: This chili is SO easy to make. You can pretty much throw whatever you have into the pot and it'll be great. (I added some leftover salsa once.) It's very colorful, not to mention delicious.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes with liquid, chopped
1 (19 ounce) can kidney beans with liquid
1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, undrained
directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Saute onions, carrots, and garlic until tender
Stir in green pepper, red pepper, celery, and chili powder
Cook until vegetables are tender, about 6 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, and cook 4 minutes
Stir in tomatoes, kidney beans, and corn
Season with cumin, oregano, and basil
Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to medium
Cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally
